response.answer_text: The question was - What hat’s a Grammacticla Article In English, the articles ‘a, an or the’ are parts of the grammar. They are either indefinite (a) or definite (the). I have never heard of them referred to that way. Thanks for the A2A.

Maybe it is about the Grammatical functions of articles. About kind of articles, the definite and indefinite articles. We knew already that English articles have functioned as adjective in a sentence. Grammatical article has vague meaning.
